name: 开局一只蛋
description:
Vivid world
Open world, free to explore, you can find rare treasures in the world to enhance the strength of the beast. The world scene can be destroyed in addition to the fixed terrain, and perhaps some treasures will be hidden in a stone. Walking in the world to always be careful of other exotic animals around, than your level of the exotic will take the initiative to attack you, lower than your level of the exotic will take the initiative to avoid, you can identify them through the small map.


phagocytosis
Can evolve by swallowing other exotic animals, get a new appearance and skills, the current version of the final level of the super God beast, the subsequent update of the Taikoo series of higher level of exotic animals, please look forward to it.


copulation
In the game, opposite-sex beasts of the same level can mate and lay eggs, and players can steal eggs to boost energy. If evolution fails, it will increase the chance of mating, and after mating, it can catch the alien animal and feed the egg to incubate, and the breeding offspring can command their behavior (follow, attack, retreat, standby).


Spur the fight
The original mode of operation, so that the launch of skills more arbitrary, no longer memorize a key corresponding to which skill effect and worry, just the mouse stroke direction skills will be issued in that direction, the avoidance direction is also the same. More interactive skills precision strike. All skills have no cooldown time, do not always look at a skill cooldown number zero and miss the wonderful battle, just focus on the opponent, put your eyes on the battle feast.


Beast talent
Reaching the level of the divine Beast and above will unlock talents and greatly enhance the power of the alien, such as Suzaku's Nirvana regeneration: regeneration after death by consuming meripoints. Greatly increased survivability. Each beast has a different talent, please experience.


Free upbringing
After swallowing the beast will get attribute points, you can assign attribute points to develop different abilities of the beast. For example, the white tiger thunder injury skills are more, you can enhance the skill damage by adding the "thunder" attribute, or add the "Xuan" attribute to strengthen the physical attack, different choices will have different experiences.


More gameplay updates continue, stay tuned...
